overview: "Pop Hard" is a story about the perils of mixing business with pleasure. Generally, the outcome is not favorable, but for these handsome studs, The Fates have had a change of heart. Moon uses her head to get ahead - that is, her boss's head. I kid you not ladies, sexual favors can get you everywhere! "Pop Hard" will show you just how far one is willing to go for the love of money and power.
title: Pop Hard
